title: JPDBv2㋕
author: jpdb, Kuuube, Gecko
description:
Contains 99.99% of the JPDB corpus up to frequency 25000, 99.5% up to 70000, and 98.6% up to 100000.
㋕ is used to indicate a frequency for a hiragana reading and is ignored in the internal frequency to allow for use as a frequency sorting dictionary.
